column5: Just Breathe is 3600 sq ft of living space plus a ground level bar. This house has it all! Luxurious accommodations and decor, tvs in every room including a 60 inch in the bar, a playground for the kids, 3 living rooms to relax after a fun filled day at the beach, and more. Every room has a private bathroom plus an additional full bathroom for guest that may be on the sofa bed. There are decks on both levels with plenty of seating to enjoy the view. We would love to welcome your family!
